title: Experienced Graphic Designer
job_overview:
We are looking for talented GRAPHIC DESIGNER with Animated graphic design skillset and a VIDEO EDITOR
For hiring ASAP - send requirements before July 7, 2025, Monday, 5pm PHT

Here are more details about the position:
Fully remote, independent contractor, direct hire for a US company
Permanent position
This is for a media company in the US 
Work schedule: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM EST with 1 hour lunch break (this is non flexible, and non negotiable)
Offer: 1,000 to 1,200 USD per month

REQUIREMENTS:
Proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite (including InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, and Acrobat)
Strong design and creative abilities
Extensive experience designing for print AND digital; clear understanding of press terminology and how to format projects for the press
FLUENT USE of the English language in written and verbal communication
Easily comprehends written and verbal instructions given in English; strong mental reasoning to deduce what actions need to be taken for an assigned task (proper execution without the assignment having to be explained repeatedly)
Experience using a project management system to post projects and send project reviews (experience with Robohead a big plus, but if you have any experience with other project management tools, you'll easily pick this up)
Provide 5 examples of strong design work that you completed (3 of them need to be editorial or ad design examples)
Animated graphic design skillset using Adobe After Effects is a plus as well
Commitment to turn projects around quickly.

To apply:
1. PDF FILE - Send 5 examples of your best design work (3 of them need to be editorial or ad design examples) 
2. Link to a 2 minute video introduction of you and your work as graphic designer
3. Link to your complete online portfolio or a link to your Canva site (Canva site has to be downloadable), or a Google drive link to your portfolio (preferably a file, not folders)
4. Asking salary in USD, monthly rate, 40 hours per week
